page.title: 19Offwell village
page.content:
GRID REFERENCE :0319 0099 No. of houses: 80 + holiday homes: 2 Population: 187 Employment ---------- Outside Housewife/ Retired Area child/student 44 41 92
Employed Locally: 10 Rector for 3 neighbouring parishes 1 Carpenter/undertaker/house repairs 1 Shop and sub post office 2 Farm of 245 acres - 52 cows 3 Farm of 93 acres - 93 cows 1 Gardener 1 Employed marking examination papers 1
Amenities: Library visits village once every two weeks. Electricity Sub Station. Private bus once weekly.
